mapper.select: SELECT code, divid_pre_notice_date, divid_agm_pum_date, divid_plan_announce_date, divid_plan_date, divid_regist_date, divid_operate_date, divid_pay_date, divid_stock_market_date, divid_cash_ps_before_tax, divid_cash_ps_after_tax, divid_stocks_ps, divid_cash_stock, divid_reserve_to_stock_ps FROM BAO_STOCK_DIVIDEND_DATA
SELECT code, divid_pre_notice_date, max(divid_plan_date) divid_plan_date FROM BAO_STOCK_DIVIDEND_DATA GROUP BY code
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BAO_STOCK_DIVIDEND_DATA(code, divid_pre_notice_date, divid_agm_pum_date, divid_plan_announce_date, divid_plan_date, divid_regist_date, divid_operate_date, divid_pay_date, divid_stock_market_date, divid_cash_ps_before_tax, divid_cash_ps_after_tax, divid_stocks_ps, divid_cash_stock, divid_reserve_to_stock_ps) VALUES (#{code}, #{preNoticeDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{agmAnnouncementDate}, #{planAnnounceDate}, #{planDate}, #{registerDate}, #{operateDate}, #{payDate}, #{marketDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{cashPerShareBeforeTax}, #{cashPerShareAfterTax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stockPerShare}, #{cashStock,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{divid_reserve_to_stock_ps,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

SELECT SEQ_BAO_STOCK_DIVIDEND_DATA.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO BAO_STOCK_DIVIDEND_DATA(id, code, divid_pre_notice_date, divid_agm_pum_date, divid_plan_announce_date, divid_plan_date, divid_regist_date, divid_operate_date, divid_pay_date, divid_stock_market_date, divid_cash_ps_before_tax, divid_cash_ps_after_tax, divid_stocks_ps, divid_cash_stock, divid_reserve_to_stock_ps) VALUES (#{id}, #{code}, #{preNoticeDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{agmAnnouncementDate}, #{planAnnounceDate}, #{planDate}, #{registerDate}, #{operateDate}, #{payDate}, #{marketDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{cashPerShareBeforeTax}, #{cashPerShareAfterTax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stockPerShare}, #{cashStock,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{divid_reserve_to_stock_ps,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
